     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Pawn constructor.
        Parameters:
        bw - TRUE=Black, FALSE=White
        x - X Position
        y - Y Position
        king - TRUE if the Pawn is the king. (Valid only if bw=FALSE)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If both king and bw are TRUE
